text: 🚨 New Report: America's Healthcare Affordability Crisis 🚨Did you know that Americans are struggling to afford healthcare? 🤯 A recent report by PayZen reveals that many people can only afford a max of $97/month for out-of-pocket medical costs! 💸This means that preventive visits, prescription drugs, mental health care, and diagnostic testing are often skipped or delayed. 🤕 It's time to take action and make healthcare more affordable for all! 💪PayZen is leading the way with AI-powered solutions to tackle this crisis. 🚀 By streamlining medical billing and payment processes, they aim to improve patient satisfaction and financial outcomes for healthcare providers. 👍Let's work together to make healthcare more accessible and affordable! 💕
